rules.description: Used for Slack integration for Onica Approval process
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Account_Name__c)), OR( ISPICKVAL($User.Segment__c , "Onica"), ISPICKVAL($User.Sub_Segment__c , "AWS"), ISPICKVAL($User.Sub_Segment__c , "Canada"), $Permission.Admin_Approver, $Permission.BU_Approver, $Permission.Legal_Approver, $Permission.Ops_Approver, $Permission.Tech_Approver ))
